data.title: Educating Rita
data.meta_description: Rita is a hairdresser who enrolls in literature tutorials at a British university in an effort to better her life. Frank Bryant is the English professor assigned to teach her. While Rita embarks on a radical transformation, Frank finds himself falling in love with her while sinking into alcoholism.
data.text:
Welcome to our new library catalog! For login assistance and FAQs check here. Contact us for more information.

The library is performing database maintenance on Tuesday, August 13th 8am to 12pm. This may cause service interruption and you may not be able to access the library catalog during this time. Residents will still be able to check out and return items.
